items.summary: Replace the payment QR image displayed in the Payment Section with the user-provided uploaded QR image, keeping the app’s existing static asset path `/assets/generated/payment-qr.dim_512x512.png` (i.e., update the file at `frontend/public/assets/generated/payment-qr.dim_512x512.png`).
Remove the Login/Logout icon/button from the landing page header UI (currently rendered in `frontend/src/App.tsx`) so it is not visible to users.

After the user clicks the “I Have Paid” button and the app transitions to the confirmation screen, display this exact English message prominently: “You will get access within 10 mins after checking your payment details”. Update the existing confirmation copy in `frontend/src/components/PaymentConfirmation.tsx` accordingly.
